snippet: Hundreds of police officers, backed by armored vehicles, stormed a lawless southern village on Monday after people suspected of growing marijuana fired rocket-propelled grenades, mortars and machine guns at officers during a drug raid
abstract: Hundreds of Albanian police officers storm lawless southern village Lazarat after people suspected of growing marijuana fired rocket-propelled grenades, mortars and machine guns at officers during drug raid.
lead_paragraph: Hundreds of police officers, backed by armored vehicles, stormed a lawless southern village on Monday after people suspected of growing marijuana fired rocket-propelled grenades, mortars and machine guns at officers during a drug raid
